Verses: 1 neengal Idaraladaiyaadhapadikku Ivaigalai Ungalukku Sonnen.
2 avargal Ungalai Jebaaalayangalukkup Purambaakkuvaargal; Melum Ungalaik Kolaiseygiravan Thaan Dhevanukkuth Thonduseygiravanendru Ninaikkun Kaalam Varum.
3 avargal Pidhaavaiyum Ennaiyum Ariyaadhapadiyinaal Ivaigalai Ungalukku Seyvaargal.

4 andhak Kaalam Varumbodhu Naan Ivaigalai Ungalukku Sonnenendru Neengal Ninaikkumpadi Ivaigalai Ungalukku Solliyirukkiren; Naan Ungaludanekooda Irundhapadiyinaal Aarambaththile Ivaigalai Ungalukku Sollavillai.
5 ippozhudhu Naan Ennai Anuppinavaridaththirkup Pogiren; Enge Pogireerendru Ungalil Oruvanum Ennaik Ketkavillai.
6 aanaalum Naan Ivaigalai Ungalukku Sonnadhinaal Ungal Irudhayam Dhukkaththaal Niraindhirukkiradhu.
7 naan Ungalukku Unmaiyai Sollugiren; Naan Pogiradhu Ungalukkup Prayojanamaayirukkum; Naan Pogaadhirundhaal, Thetraravaalan Ungalidaththil Varaar; Naan Poveneyaagil Avarai Ungalidaththirku Anuppuven.
8 avar Vandhu, Paavaththaikkuriththum, Needhiyaikkuriththum, Nyaayaththeerppaikkuriththum, Ulagaththaik Kandiththu Unarththuvaar.
9 avargal Ennai Visuvaasiyaadhapadiyinaale Paavaththaikkuriththum,
10 neengal Ini Ennaik Kaanaadhapadikku Naan En Pidhaavinidaththirkup Pogirapadiyinaale Needhiyaikkuriththum,
11 indha Ulagaththin Adhibadhi Nyaayantheerkkappattadhinaale Nyaayaththeerppaikkuriththum, Kandiththu Unarththuvaar.
12 innum Anegankaariyangalai Naan Ungalukku Sollavendiyadhaayirukkiradhu, Avaigalai Neengal Ippozhudhu Thaangamaatteergal.

13 saththiya Aaviyaagiya Avar Varumbodhu, Sagala Saththiyaththirkullum Ungalai Nadaththuvaar; Avar Thammudaiya Suyamaaip Pesaamal, Thaam Kelvippattavaigal Yaavaiyuncholli, Varappogira Kaariyangalai Ungalukku Arivippaar.
14 avar Ennudaiyadhil Eduththu Ungalukku Arivippadhinaal Ennai Magimaippaduththuvaar.
15 pidhaavinudaiyavaigal Yaavum Ennudaiyavaigal; Adhinaale Avar Ennudaiyadhil Eduththu Ungalukku Arivippaar Endren.
16 naan Pidhaavinidaththirkup Pogirapadiyinaal Konjakkaalaththile Ennaik Kaanaadhiruppeergal, Marupadiyum Konjakkaalaththile Ennaik Kaanbeergal Endraar.

17 appozhudhu Avarudaiya Seesharil Silar: Naan Pidhaavinidaththirkup Pogirapadiyinaal, Konjakkaalaththile Ennaik Kaanaadhiruppeergal Endrum, Marupadiyum Konjakkaalaththile Ennaik Kaanbeergal Endrum Avar Nammudane Sollugiradhin Karuththenna Endru Thangalukkulle Pesikkondadhumandri;
18 konjakkaalam Engiraare, Idhenna? Avar Sollugiradhu Innadhendru Namakku Vilangavillaiye Endraargal.

19 adhaikkuriththuth Thammidaththil Ketkumpadi Avargal Virumbugiradhai Yesu Arindhu, Avargalai Nokki: Konjakkaalaththile Ennaik Kaanaadhiruppeergal, Marupadiyum Konjakkaalaththile Ennaik Kaanbeergal Endru Naan Sonnadhaikkuriththu Neengal Ungalukkulle Visaarikkireergalo?
20 meyyaagave Meyyaagave Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren: Neengal Azhudhu Pulambuveergal, Ulagamo Sandhoshappadum; Neengal Dhukkappaduveergal, Aanaalum Ungal Dhukkam Sandhoshamaaga Maarum.
21 sthreeyaanavalukkup Prasavakaalam Vandhirukkumbodhu Aval Dhukkamadaigiraal; Pillaipetravudane Oru Manushan Ulagaththil Pirandhaanengira Sandhoshaththinaal Appuram Ubaththiravaththai Ninaiyaal.

22 adhupola Neengalum Ippozhudhu Dhukkamadaindhirukkireergal. Naan Marupadiyum Ungalaik Kaanben, Appozhudhu Ungal Irudhayam Sandhoshappadum, Ungal Sandhoshaththai Oruvanum Ungalidaththilirundhu Eduththuppodamaattaan.

23 andha Naalile Neengal Ennidaththil Ondrun Ketkamaatteergal. Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren, Neengal En Naamaththinaale Pidhaavinidaththil Kettukkolvadhedhuvo Adhai Avar Ungalukkuth Tharuvaar.
24 idhuvaraikkum Neengal En Naamaththinaale Ondrum Ketkavillai; Kelungal, Appozhudhu Ungal Sandhosham Niraivaayirukkumpadi Petrukkolveergal.
25 ivaigalai Naan Uvamaigalaai Ungaludane Pesugiren; Kaalam Varum, Appozhudhu Naan Uvamaigalaai Ungaludane Pesaamal, Pidhaavaikkuriththu Velippadaiyaaga Ungalukku Arivippen.
26 andha Naalil Neengal En Naamaththinaale Vendikkolveergal. Ungalukkaagap Pidhaavai Naan Kettukkolvenendru Ungalukku Sollavendiyadhillai.
27 neengal Ennai Snegiththu, Naan Dhevanidaththilirundhu Purappattuvandhenendru Visuvaasikkirapadiyinaal Pidhaadhaame Ungalai Snegikkiraar.
28 naan Pidhaavinidaththilirundhu Purappattu Ulagaththile Vandhen; Marupadiyum Ulagaththaivittu Pidhaavinidaththirkup Pogiren Endraar.
29 avarudaiya Seeshargal Avarai Nokki: Idho, Ippozhudhu Neer Uvamaiyaaip Pesaamal, Velippadaiyaaip Pesugireer.
30 neer Ellaavatraiyum Arindhirukkireer Endrum, Oruvan Ummai Vinaava Venduvadhillaiyendrum, Ippozhudhu Arindhirukkirom; Idhinaale Neer Dhevanidaththilirundhu Vandheerendru Visuvaasikkirom Endraargal.
31 yesu Avargalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Ippozhudhu Neengal Visuvaasikkireergal.

32 idho, Neengal Sidharundu, Avanavan Thanthan Idaththukkup Poi, Ennaith Thaniye Vittuvidunkaalam Varum; Adhu Ippozhudhu Vandhirukkiradhu; Aanaalum Naan Thaniththiren, Pidhaa Ennudanekooda Irukkiraar.
33 ennidaththil Ungalukku Samaadhaanam Undaayirukkum Poruttu Ivaigalai Ungalukku Sonnen. Ulagaththil Ungalukku Ubaththiravam Undu, Aanaalum Thidankollungal; Naan Ulagaththai Jeyiththen Endraar.
